channel.title: radiomics on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in radiomics on Memo Tut

item.title: Texture analysis learned with pyradiomics
item.description: # pyradiomics You can calculate such image features. First Order Statistics Shape-based (2D and 3D) Gray Level Cooccurence Matrix (GLCM) Gray Level Run Length Matrix (GLRLM) Gray Level Size Zone Matrix (GLSZM) Gray Level Dependece Matrix (GLDM) Neighboring Gray Tone Difference Matrix (NGTDM) A one-dimensional quantitative value “first order” for an image ~~ (including features that make you wonder if it should be interpreted as one-dimensional) ~~ and a shape that analyzes the shape such as how round or jagged It is a library that can analyze GLCM etc.
